segments.name: Ichika
segments.text: Where will the wind take you today?

segments.name: Me
segments.text: Whereever my jet engine wants to

segments.name: Ichika
segments.text:
You jet-powered aircraft are so entitled!
Y'all should try flying on a single propeller some time.

buttons.text: I have the engines i am made with

segments.name: Me
segments.text: Some day, maybe i can switch..

segments.name: Ichika
segments.text:
Are you making fun of me again? 
Hmpf, seriously...

segments.name: Me
segments.text: I just thought that would be amazing!
